data.title: Disney Star Monique Coleman Looks Back on ‘High School Musical’: It Was Very Diverse For Its Time
data.meta_description: Monique Coleman, star of “High School Musical,” told Bold Life she thinks Disney’s “High School Musical” series was very diverse, especially for its time. “I don’t think it’s as diverse as it could be, but it was 13 years ago.
data.text:
Monique Coleman, star of “High School Musical,” told Bold Life she thinks Disney’s “High School Musical” series was very diverse, especially for its time. “I don’t think it’s as diverse as it could be, but it was 13 years ago. And I think for where it was, I think that it did a great job of representing different people.”

The actress and UN youth activist also gave advice to young stars who seem to have had trouble adjusting to fame and said it’s essential to have a strong sense of self and “that you say ‘no’ a lot.” She said, “When I started out, I really wanted to be picked…every role I got felt like it validated my existence. And now, I don’t feel that way.”
